feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: required booking fields message by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20688
  • feat: dry run behaviour for CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20690
  • feat: dry run behaviour for event type atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20689
  • feat: dry run behaviour for AvailabilitySettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20686
  • feat: dry run behaviour for connect atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20699
  • feat: Redirect to original event link for rescheduling cancelled booking by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18605
  • fix: Improves dialog window that appears when there is no availability in a month. Adding a description to clarify limits when rolling or range period types are in use. by @shawnCaza in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20451
  • feat: email workflow templates translation by @giripatel in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20674
  • fix: make padding equal on availability toggle by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20708
  • feat: placeholder component for user dropdown to remove layout shift by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20696
  • fix: Tasker import and error handling for routing form responses by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20713
  • fix: availability CTA height by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20714
  • fix: don't allow seats for recurring events by @PAVANNAIK25 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19257
  • fix: routing form endpoints date filters validation [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20715
  • feat: v2 return slots based on routing form response by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20637
  • feat: organization booking hooks by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20611
  • fix: readonly ics error by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20651
  • feat: Embed - Show skeleton loader when pageType is provided by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20646
  • perf: Fetch data server-side for Webhook Create page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20675
  • refactor: improve error handling in captureErrorsMiddleware by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20718
  • feat: lindy.ai app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20721
  • feat: v2 get slots using teamSlug + eventTypeSlug + optional organizationSlug by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20554
  • fix: wrong translation value by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20727
  • chore: Rename @calcom/lib/date-fns to @calcom/lib/dayjs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19870
  • perf: remove user booking routes from middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20726
  • fix: EventTypeSettings atom default schedule title by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20725
  • test: e2e test for the Routing Form to Event Booking flow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20728
  • feat: Whitelist user's from workflow spam scanning by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20717

New Contributors

  • @shawnCaza made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20451
  • @giripatel made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.0...v5.2.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable Google Translate from HTML by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20738
  • fix: buggy skeleton rendering for month view by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20744
  • fix: Wrong schedule ID set for child managed event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20745
  • feat: v2 book team events using teamSlug & eventTypeSlug by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20585
  • fix: failing e2e test by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20751
  • feat: filter users by assigned attribute options [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20659
  • fix: Admin/owner unable to confirm managed bookings by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20743
  • refactor: v2 automatic round robin reassign error message by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20755
  • fix: return react fragment from all layout.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20737
  • feat: add guards to stripe teams controller by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20540

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.1...v5.2.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: slim down middleware matcher by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20735
  • chore: Skip flakey tests SEO tests by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20761
  • feat: Write UTM params to Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20759
  • chore: Add consent message when SMS workflows are related by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20741
  • chore: Remove verbose logging by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20732
  • fix: offer seats feature is broken by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20758
  • fix: Remove trailing } from utm param by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20763
  • fix: only managed users assignable to managed team event by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20754
  • feat: make skeleton for booking embed accurate by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20765
  • fix: calendar connect atoms by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20766
  • fix: header overlaps in month view on short viewport by @evan-liu in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20749
  • fix: 404 for embed.js in single domain-single org self hosting setup by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20120
  • chore: improved warning for UNKEY_ROOT_KEY by @ronitrajfr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20785
  • fix: v2 Sentry errors by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20788
  • fix: Org onboarding handle error due to platform team being moved to regular org by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20786
  • fix: Wrong text EmbedTheme -> Theme by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20790
  • refactor: replace timeZone string validation with timeZoneSchema by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20719
  • fix: improved 'use-identity-login' error message for users trying to signInn using different provider by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20582
  • fix: Location not changing when rescheduling by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20404
  • fix: sms workflow api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20795
  • fix: semi-colon in the bottom of layout UI by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20799
  • chore: Add layout.tsx to Foundation team CODEOWNERS by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20802
  • chore: remove swagger app and its dependencies by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20798

New Contributors

  • @evan-liu made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20749
  • @ronitrajfr made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20785

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.2...v5.2.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Convert an error in webhook to info by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20806
  • feat: add "React (Atom)" to embed generator and rename rest by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20618
  • refactor: remove iframe usage note from Preview tab in EmbedTabs component by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20810
  • fix: api v2 license check by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20813
  • chore: Add more Foundation and Consumer team CODEOWNERS configuration by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20816
  • refactor: forbidden 403 v2 guard messages by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20794
  • feat: update DeleteSegmentDialog to use ConfirmationDialogContent CAL-5399 by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20820
  • feat: open dropdown right after adding a filter by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20819
  • fix: remove window usage in not-found client by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20822
  • fix: user is already part of a team by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20774
  • refactor: Remove kysely as its unused by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20817
  • perf: Fetch data server-side for Api Keys page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20677
  • perf: simplify metadata in availability schedule view by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20827
  • feat: Optout of SMS workflows by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20769

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.3...v5.2.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: caching for sprite.svg by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20832
  • fix: platform org members cannot access their public booking page by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20821
  • refactor: Returns 400 error for ZodErrors by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20831
  • fix: eventType filter on /insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20823
  • feat: custom reply To Email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20771
  • feat(insights): add progress indicator to download button on /insights and /insights/routing (CAL-5408) by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20631
  • perf: SSR for /teams by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20824
  • perf: SSR - /availablilty/[schedule] by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20829
  • fix: getBookings max 1 month in the past when no date filters specified by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20911
  • chore: Pass customReplyTo as a managed event type prop by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20909

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.4...v5.2.5
